name: Spoop Ghost Haus (such scare)
description:
This game is part of series wherein I make one prototype per week based on a theme.

Prototype Week #4: Make "DLC" for one of your previous games.

Introducing Spoop Ghost Haus (such scare) v2.wow!  Now with a bigger floor plan, more mechanics, and 200% more dog per square inch!

Original game made by Andrew Petersell and Jenna Galka.

Based on an original design by Daniel Kimsey.
